renderedFields.description:
Description:
Application URL: http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login

 

Steps:

  1. Navigate to http://smarttasks-env.eba-ep3hvh25.us-east-1.elasticbeanstalk.com/login
  2. Enter Email Address: user1@gmail.com
  3. Enter password: Welcome!
  4. Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn)
  5. Verify Total tasks count should not be 0

Expected: Total tasks count is showing 0
Actual: Total tasks count should not be 0

content.text: Verify Total tasks count should not be 0
Expected: Total tasks count is showing 0
Actual: Total tasks count should not be 0

fields.summary: Login is not working in Smart tasks

parsed_issue.summary: Login is not working in Smart tasks
parsed_issue.description:
Description: 
 Application URL:      Steps: • Navigate to  •   
 • Enter Email Address:  • user1@gmail.com 
 • Enter password: Welcome! 
 • Click "Sign in" button (CSS: #login-btn) 
 • Verify Total tasks count should not be 0 
 Expected: Total tasks count is showing 0 
 Actual: Total tasks count should not be 0
reproduction_steps: Step 2: Enter 'user1@gmail.com' in the Email Address field
Step 3: Enter 'Welcome!' in the password field
Step 4: Click on the 'Sign in' button (CSS: #login-btn)
Step 5: Verify that Total tasks count is not 0
parsed_issue.expected_behavior: Total tasks count should not be 0

reproduction_steps.description: Wait for page to load after login
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": [], "value": "3000", "wait_condition": "Navigation complete and page fully loaded", "validation": "", "screenshot": false}

reproduction_steps.description: Wait for dynamic content to load
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": [], "value": "2000", "wait_condition": "Page fully loaded with all data", "validation": "", "screenshot": false}

reproduction_steps.description: Verify the total tasks count is displayed
reproduction_steps.actual_result: {"selectors": ["//h2[contains(@class, 'stat')]", "//h2[contains(@class, 'count')]", "//h1[number() >= 0]", "//h2[number() >= 0]", "//h3[number() >= 0]", "//span[contains(@class, 'count')]", "//span[contains(@class, 'metric')]", "//p[contains(text(), 'Total Tasks')]/following-sibling::h2", "//span[contains(text(), 'Total')]/following-sibling::h2", "//label[contains(text(), 'Total')]/following-sibling::*[self::h1 or self::h2 or self::h3]", "//div[.//p[contains(text(), 'Total Tasks')]]//h2", "//div[.//span[contains(text(), 'Total')]]//h2", ".stat-value", ".metric-count", ".count", ".number", ".display-value", "h2", "h1", "span", "div"], "value": "Extract and verify the numeric count", "wait_condition": "Numeric value is visible and loaded", "validation": "Extract number and compare with expected behavior", "screenshot": true}

reproduction_plan.expected_outcome: Total tasks count should not be 0

executed_steps.description: Wait for page to load after login
Wait for dynamic content to load
Verify the total tasks count is displayed

reproduction_result.root_cause_analysis: The bug described in JIRA indicated that the total tasks count was showing 0 when it should not be. However, during the reproduction attempt, the total tasks count was observed to be 3, as indicated by the 'actual' result in step 7: 'Element 'total tasks count' found. Content: 3 (Value: 3)'. This means the system is working correctly and displaying the expected total tasks count.
recommendations: Verify if the bug was reported under incorrect conditions or with outdated information.
Close the bug report as it appears to be resolved based on the current observation.
